title: VA Woes Continue Amid Calls For Shinseki To Resign
teaser: Pressure is mounting on Veterans Affairs Secretary Eric Shinseki, as longstanding problems in the VA system are revealed.
contentencoded:
A report from the Department of Veterans Affairs Inspector General found systemic problems at VA facilities in Phoenix and across the entire agency.

As hearings continue, reports of widespread problems with and long waits were revealed, and there is increasing pressure on VA Secretary Eric Shinseki to resign.

ABC News political director Rick Klein joins Here & Now’s Robin Young to discuss the latest news on the embattled VA office and its secretary.

Guest

  • Rick Klein, political director at ABC News. He tweets @rickklein.
